PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-11222020-12-18,  ,  TC,  GLPA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectGreat Lakes Pilotage Authority's borrowing Limit ** Increase **
PrecisOrder (1) repealing paragraph (b) of Order in Council P.C. 2010-233 of February 23, 2010; and (2) fixing the maximum amount of money that can be borrowed by the GREAT LAKES PILOTAGE AUTHORITY, in Canada or elsewhere, for the purpose of defraying its expenses at $12,000,000.
AttachmentsAttachment
